name: HtmlHelpers

values.name: aButton
values.comment: create an `a` tag with no href that can be used as a button
values.type: msg -> List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: emptyHtml
values.comment: A span tag with style set to display: none.

values.name: maybeHtml
values.comment: Return empty html if the argument is Nothing

values.name: maybeView
values.comment:
If the model is Nothing, then return emply html, else call the given
  view function on the model.
values.type: (model -> Html.Html msg) -> Maybe.Maybe model -> Html.Html msg

values.name: onClickWithDefaultPrevented
values.comment: an onClick handler, where the default is prevented

values.name: stopClickPropagation
values.comment:
Return an attribute that stops click propagation. A message must be supplied.
    Pass a NoOp message if you don't want the click to do anything.
